entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
